goals__remit: Texas Instruments provides innovative semiconductor technologies to help our customers create the worlds most advanced electronics. Our analog and embedded processing technologies permeate daily life in many ways, from digital communications and entertainment to medical services, automotive systems, as well as to applications for smart manufacturing and wide ranging applications in-between.
